thread.title: Greg Hardy's awful rap video surfaces one day before his Cowboys debut
thread.title_full: Greg Hardy's awful rap video surfaces one day before his Cowboys debut

author: Nick Schwartz
title: Greg Hardy's awful rap video surfaces one day before his Cowboys debut
text:
Greg Hardy's awful rap video surfaces one day before his Cowboys debut USA Today Sports 17 hrs ago Nick Schwartz Greg Hardy will return to the NFL Sunday from a four-game suspension for conduct detrimental to the league after he was found guilty of domestic abuse last year, and the controversial defensive end already made headlines earlier this week after making eyebrow-raising comments about Tom Brady’s wife. Just in time for Hardy’s debut with the Cowboys, TMZ published a music video starring Hardy Saturday, which features Hardy dancing with a stripper and rapping explicit lyrics.
AdChoices Hardy, who goes by the nickname “The Kraken,” recorded the song in 2014 with Memphis rapper Ja-Alan. Short clips of the video emerged last October while Hardy was a member of the Panthers, but the Dallas Morning News found that Ja-Alan posted the full version of the song “I’m Just Me” on YouTube .
© Provided by USA Today Sports hardy
“I’m just me. I’m just real, and that’s all that I do.
Up in the booth spittin’ the truth. That’s me with my crew.
I’m just me. I do what I preach. That boy is a beast.”
Hardy’s verse also contains the phrase “crack a [expletive].” You can watch the (NSFW) video here .
